name: screen-navigator
description: Navigate easily between screens, with transitions.

scripts.build: npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
scripts.build-dev: browserify src/ScreenNavigator.js -s ScreenNavigator -t babelify | derequire > dist/screen-navigator.js
scripts.build-prod: browserify src/ScreenNavigator.js -s ScreenNavigator -t babelify | derequire | uglifyjs > dist/screen-navigator.min.js

author: Manuel Odelain
